title: WATCH: I had a baby in prison
text:
WATCH: I had a baby in prison

Watch Jessica Kent detail her experience giving birth in prison.

Having a baby is for many women an incredible experience, but for some it can be harrowing and traumatic.

Young mom Jessica Kent struggled with addiction for years, and has been in and out of jail many times.

On her YouTube channel she shares her personal opinion and experience of giving birth while imprisoned for dealing drugs.



Watch the video below or on YouTube:

Chat back:



Share your story with us, and we could publish your mail. Anonymous contributions are welcome.
description: Watch Jessica Kent detail her experience giving birth in prison.
